titleStmt.title: A commemoration, or A calling to minde of the great and eminent deliverance from the powder-plot. A mercie never to be forgotten by the people of God, who have been, still are, and ever will be, the greatest sharers in it, and the best imp[r]overs of it.
titleStmt.author: Turner, John, fl. 1654.

titleStmt.title: A commemoration, or A calling to minde of the great and eminent deliverance from the powder-plot. A mercie never to be forgotten by the people of God, who have been, still are, and ever will be, the greatest sharers in it, and the best imp[r]overs of it.
titleStmt.author: Turner, John, fl. 1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.B. and are to be sold by John Collins dwelling in Little-Britain over against S. Buttolphs Church.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
In the title, the r in "inprovers" has failed to print.
